vsParam:
Yah, Peppermint!?
You guys are here, too!?

Yeah. It's been a while since you come out.
We got worried, so we are here to check on you.

Lydie, don't tell us...
You've been painting all along?

Uh, yes.
Hee hee, I just finished it!

Wow... You painted... us?
It's delicate...

Yes.
Because... You guys take care of me all the time,

I want to paint something to express my gratitude.
But I am not very good at painting...

That's why you wanted to use good painting materials?
Ha ha, you...

Ho ho, I am so happy, Lydie!
Right, [px]?
Let's hang it in the lobby!
This is something to be treasured our whole life!

T, the lobby?
It's kind of embarrassing...

Something to be treasured your whole life!
I'd be very happy if it's really worth collecting!

Uh... It's so good
to meet you guys!

Although I must go back to my world one day,
before that... Please allow me to be with you!

Of course!
Let's explore every corner of this world!

Yeah!
We'll always be "comrades" in the Academy!

... But, there's something I must say.
Did you all forget about the money?

Ah ha ha, really?
I guess you still have to work hard to make money.

Ah ha ha, yeah...
Uh... I must work hard now...
